Lesson.Introduction: In this first unit in the Web Dev course we will take a look at HTML.
Lesson.Objective: The objective is to learn how pages are structured using HTML and to create a basic Web Page using common HTML tags.
Lesson.KeyTerm: HTML, tags, head, body, tables, forms
Lesson.Reading: Read Chapter 2, Introduction to HTML5: Part 1, of the e-text. Do the exercises for Chapter 2.

Lesson.Objective: Learn about form input types and page structure elements.
Lesson.KeyTerm: color, date, datetime, email, month, number, range, search, tel, time, url, autocomplete, datalist.
Lesson.Reading: Read Chapter 3, Introduction to HTML5: Part 2, of the e-text. Do chapter 3 exercises.

Lesson.Introduction: This unit will be an introduction to CSS.
Lesson.Objective: The objective is to alter the appearance of a website using cascading style sheets.
Lesson.KeyTerm: CSS, inline style, external style sheet
Lesson.Reading: Read Chapter 4, Introduction to Cascading Style SheetsTM (CSS): Part 1, of the e-text. Do the chapter 4 exercises.
